EmailTemplate.description: Use to refer a customer to Labinal Power Systems
EmailTemplate.name: ACT – Refer To Labinal Power Systems
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Case.Subject} : {!Case.CaseNumber}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Case.Contact},
Thank you for contacting Honeywell Aerospace. My name is {!Case.OwnerFirstName} and I’m following up on your submittal. Since your order contained product(s) not directly supported by Honeywell, I am providing you with alternate contact information for Labinal Power Systems who supports the part(s) for spares orders. Please utilize the following contact information provided by Labinal Power Systems.
To order spares, please address your PO to:
LABINAL POWER SYSTEMS Power division - Réau site Rond-point René Ravaud 77551 MOISSY CRAMAYEL FRANCE Att. Frank LAVEILLE
You may post your PO in .PDF format, to the 24/7 Customer Service Center: etras.csc@snecma.fr especially in case of an AOG/critical order.
Alternatively, you may send your request directly to Frank LAVEILLE’s email address: frank.laveille@labinal-power.com
Thank you for your interest in our products!
Best Regards, Honeywell Order Support Team
